title: League team looking for 3 dedicated players. (bronze to gold)
body:
Hey lads, 
looking for 3 more members for our team, 
adc
mid 
top 
needed, must be chill and keen to play at nights. we aim to play two to three times a week.
Each one of us is looking to improve and have fun.
My ign is: GrognakTheSlayer
add me and we will chat about playing as a team

replies.body: add me as i cant seem to find you im a supp/mid main
